black people

Portal 2 is truly one of the best games ever made. The writing is exceptional, the gameplay is timeless, it is still visually pleasing, and there's near infinite content still being created for it on the community workshop. I highly recommend this game. If you have avoided it in any way, you are doing yourself a serious disservice.

I also recommend you play Portal 1 first if you can. It makes the overall experience more impactful, and the tones of each game surprisingly contrast each other, so you get more variety.

Portal 2 is perfection achieved. I can't recommend it enough if you're looking for either a singleplayer or multiplayer experience. You'll love it, and people are always making new levels for it, so you'll essentially never get bored of it.

Portal has been one of the most groundbreaking puzzle games ever developed. Set in apeture laboratories, Portal 2 is really not just about physics and doing tests. As you go on to the later chapters, where you portal your way to find wheatley, you find yourself travelling up a time line, from when apeture laboratories was at the peak of it's glory to the fall and eventually to GlaDos. The storyline is masterfully created through recorded speeches, both from GlaDos and Cave Johnson. 


9/10

Si el Portal me encantó, ni hablar de este. El Portal se quedo un poco corto con los niveles, pero este sin duda mejoró la duración, implementó nuevos metodos para pasar los niveles. Un toque que me encanto, fue el recorrer el viejo laboratorio de Portal. Otro 10 de mi parte para esta saga. Y como siempre el remate, el emotivo tipico final de los juegos de esta saga, si bien el final de Portal fue épico (Still Alive), el de este entrega, con todas las torretas en el incio, tocó mi corazón ;D (Want You Gone).

Buy this bundled with Portal 1 (if it's still available) because once you finish Portal 1, you're going to want to jump straight into Portal 2. It also has a co-op you can play with friends (Portal 2) and design your own levels for other's to try (also Portal 2). 
Oustanding series and I'd happily pay $59.99 for a Portal 3. Get on it Valve!

Greatest puzzle style FPS game I have ever played. The story line is awesome, quite dark and entertaining. Portal 2 is a much longer game than its predecessor; Its gameplay is much more in depth with all new Hard Light Bridges and the Propulsion/Repulsion/Conversion Gels. I thought it was more challenging, and yet easier to play than the original Portal. And at 51 achievments instead of Portal's meager 15, and an all new immersive Multiplayer Mode, Portal 2 has lots of replay value even after you have beat the game a few times.
get this game it is full of action adventure puzzles easter eggs randomness and a grate multiplayer game get it now it's worth it

Thank you Steam!!

By far, the Portal series has the best story line of any game I've played. If that is something you look for in a game, look no further. This is a masterpiece of puzzle and action, where you can know (or think you know) the exact solution to the problem at hand, but you simply cannot manage to achieve it. Alternatively, you might have to wrack your brains trying to figure out something so simple it is brilliant. I found myself marveling at the beauty of many solutions presented, where you could tell some quality work certainly went into designing the test or level. 

All in all, you are absolutely getting your money's worth with this game.

Very smart game. I know both the story of the ideas to come to portal and two secrets, one about the companion cube, and another about Chells parents. I reccomend figuring them out with these three helpful hints:

CHELL 1: Cave Johnson may have had his bran uploaded to a Turret, like Carol had been uploaded to GLaDOS.

CHELL 2: Chell has a piece in 'Bring Your Daughter To Work Day' which is when GLaDOS was activated, and we know she was adopted, so that the person who bought her wasn't her parent.

CHELL 3: Three characters have the same letter at the star of there name.

COMPANION CUBE 1: The only chest chambers without the grills (can't spell the first part of the name) are the ones with Companion Cubes in them.

COMPANION CUBE 2: The grills destroy everything living passing through it. (The thing is, Chells Clothes, the Portal Device and  Light Grills can pass through it?)

COMPANION CUBE 3: Fracticide is the achievement you get in Portal 1 for destroying the companion cube. Google It.

Add all the pieces together and then your mind will be like 'WOW, REALLY!?'

I literally have NOTHING bad to say about this game, because that's how amazing this game is. The storyline is a complete success, it really tells the story of Chell and her life threatening trek through the twisted and mind boggling labotories. On top of that, the physics and puzzles in the game are fantastic, from saving turrets to colorful gel, the puzzles will keep you busy as the story develops. The characters are so rich and the game just makes you beg for a sequel. So, if your asking is this a good game, well, then you shouldn't be playing video games.

My only actual problem with this game, is the fact that they ruined the sense of isolation that they had in the first game. Don't get me wrong, it's a fantastic game, but it felt like my hand was being [i]half-held[/i] through about 90% of the story.

I still recommend this, but when will steam implement an actual rating system for user reviews? I feel like [i]thumbs-up[/i] is a hidden method of giving things a 10/10 they don't deserve.

Ну, во первых, свой обзор начну с того, что игры вэлв мне впадали в душу, но именно портал засела мне глубоко в сердце, а теперь попробую конструктивно разделить её на плюсы и минусы
ПЛЮСЫ:
1) Сюжет, ну тут без всякого, достойное продолжение довольной слабой прошлой части.
2) Атмосфера, с этими, локациями, их же масштабам, цветокоррекцией, другими аспектами просто божественны.
3) Музыка, тут многое можно не размусоливать, просто послушайте саундтрек отдельно.
4) Геймплей, ну тут обычные головоломки, но они так сделаны, что ты можешь залпом их пройти и запомнишь в них мелкие детали и их атмосферу.
Минусы:
1) Это больше к нашей локализации, и не в том что озвучено плохо, голоса не те, липсинк плохой(Тут блин роботы вы о чём), а именно минус в том, что есть реплики, которые укорены, и есть мерзкий механический звук, и он может быть у всех в разных местах.
Вывод: многие спросят: "А как же графика?" - но я отвечу, что втф ребят игра вышла в 2011 году, но её сбалансированность и однотонность просто замечательные. В итоге я смело могу ставить 10/10, т.к это шедевр, который выходит раз в 10-летие
восхитительно
